thread.section_title: Lady Gaga Pictures, Songs, Videos and Album Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: sleeps in before getting ready for Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga sleeps in before getting ready for Super Bowl | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelby Vera At Dailymail.com
title: sleeps in before getting ready for Super Bowl
text:
It's the biggest gig of her career - the halftime slot at the Super Bowl.
And Lady Gaga certainly seemed raring to go she visited the NRG Stadium in Houston ahead of the big game on Sunday.
Her visit came as she confirmed on Instagram that she would be going solo during her 13-minute set. She is only the eighth artist to perform without any special guests.
Scroll down for video
She's right at home! Lady Gaga lounges on the field as she preps for her Super Bowl halftime show at the NRG Stadium in Houston on Sunday
The star also shared a heartfelt message with her fans in the Instagram pic's caption, saying:
'I dedicate every second to the love, diversity, compassion, and wild spirit of our fan base.'
'To that kid who felt unwanted, or the grown up who remembers how hard it was to find acceptance. This is for you.'
Elegant: The star sported a dark mini skirt with a flowing train before the game
The star continued her message, saying:
'It is also for those whose hearts and minds have opened to our message.
'Thank you for believing in us so we could be here today little monsters this is YOUR stage.'
Confident: Stepping out on the field as multiple cameras snapped away, she at first looked rather awed as she looked around at the still empty stadium
Gaga time! The shyness soon passed, as she got down on the floor and rolled around
It's time! Gaga played around with a football before game time
As Gaga arrived at the field ahead of the show on Sunday, she appeared to be in superstar mode.
Stepping onto the field as multiple cameras snapped away, she at first looked rather awed as she looked around at the still empty stadium.
However any shyness soon passed, as Gaga got down on the floor and rolled around for the cameras.
Game face! The star flashed a silly face for the camera while on the field
Wardrobe malfunction: The star accidentally flashed her underthings while posing on the field
Whoops! After realizing she may have revealed to much, Gaga covered up modestly
The star looked lovely in a black skirt with a long flowing train.
She played with the garment a bit before striking a pose on the field.
As she kicked her long legs, Gaga realized she may have accidentally revealed her intimates and quickly recovered from the minor wardrobe malfunction.
Something to tell us? She shot selfies with her agent Christian Carino
Everyone wants to meet Gaga! The field was packed with people keen to see the star
Later in the day, the star was less demure.
The Alejandro artist showed off a baby pink jersey and matching helmet with the word 'Gaga' emblazoned upon it.
In the slinky pre-game video, the star shimmies for the camera while her glam squad keeps her windswept with a little blow-drying action.
A little help: After posing in the center of the field, the celeb got some help getting back up
Roar! The Alejandro singer flashed several animated faces for the camera
The field was packed with NFL big wigs, who all wanted a selfie with Gaga.
The 30-year-old was happy to oblige, posing up for a series of pictures.
Her agent at CAA, Christian Carino, was among those to get some Gaga time, showing their close relationship with a hand on her waist as they posed.
Athletic! Gaga got into the sporting spirit by passing around the pigskin
Sporty songstress! Gaga kept her balance as she threw a pass in her towering heels
The singer also took some of her own, blowing kisses into her camera.
While at the stadium, the hitmaker even tried her hand at some sports.
The star, who was born Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta, got into the sporting spirit by passing around her own ball.
Kiss kiss! Gaga records herself on the field, before getting down to work
Friend to the stars: The star cozied up to her agent Christian Carino who has repped Gaga since she moved to his agency CAA a year ago
She remained ever elegant while making her throw, as the star maintained her balance in towering stiletto heels.
Gaga, who had earlier FaceTimed her Grandma for a pep talk, wore a dramatic black gown complete with a train.
Impressive though it was, the outfit is unlikely to be nothing compared to those she wears for her performance.
Pregame fun: But Sunday is going to be a day for Gaga
Fans all around! Everyone wanted a piece of Gaga as she strutted around the field before the game
The Telephone singer has been dedicated to her Super Bowl prep, seen practicing hard with her band several times over the last few weeks.
In a Good Morning America interview Friday, the celeb told Michael Strahan she was going to put her own spin on the sporting event.
She told the former football star: 'So when I play the NLG stadium in Houston I'm gonna play it like it's a dive bar. I'm gonna do it my way.'
Had her shut eye! Gaga started game day with plenty of rest, sharing her late wake up with followers on Snapchat
All star arms! The Poker Face singer didn't let her heels stop her from throwing a mean spiral
She's got skills! The star threw the ball high over the field
Gaga started game day with plenty of rest, sharing her late wake up with followers on Snapchat.
She could be seen sleeping in a plush bed as a friend roused her from her slumber.
After taking a second to rise, the star then sent a message to her fans about the exciting day.
Wake up, sleepyhead! On Sunday, Lady Gaga got a surprise start to her day as a friend woke her up for a morning Snapchat
Red-y to go! The Perfect Illusion singer sported a red robe as she said hi to her Little Monsters before heading to Houston's NRG Stadium
After taking some time to rise, Gaga shared more of her morning on Snapchat later appearing in a silky red robe as she addressed her Little Monsters, saying:
'Hey Little Monsters, it's me. I'm getting ready to go to the venue to play the halftime show. I'm so excited!'
Even though it was the start of her day, the platinum blonde beauty looked lovely wearing a strong brow and a bit of rosy gloss on her lips in the snap.
Sleeping beauty! The Bad Romance singer flashed a smile as a mystery pal rustled the star from her sleep Sunday morning
Lady in red! The Joanne artist has been working hard to prepare for her halftime show, spotted practicing with her band more than a few times in weeks prior
She's a good sport! Gaga showed off her skivvies in a pre-game post where she can be seen shimmying for the camera in a baby pink jersey of her own
Special message: The star revealed that she would be performing a 13 minute set without guests during the half time show. She also thanked fans for their constant support and told her followers 'little monsters this is YOUR stage'
